tittle: Long COVID Now Has a Formal Definition from the WHO
description: The WHO now calls long COVID “post COVID-19 condition” and has outlined a variety of symptoms.

tittle: Are You Vaccinated?’ How to Ask Others Before Holiday Gatherings
description: We spoke with health experts about why it’s important to ask and how to evaluate your risk.

tittle: Scream Therapy: The Mental Health Benefits of Horror Movies
description: Scary movies may provide both entertainment and relief from stress and anxiety.
